abstract: The Standard & Poor 500 is now 48 percent below its peak.
snippet: The Standard & Poor 500 is now 48 percent below its peak.
lead_paragraph: Stocks just keep falling. The market got a lot closer today to the milestone I mentioned Monday — S.&P. 967. The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index ended the day down almost 6 percent, at 996. Before today, it had not closed below 1,000 since 2003.
